newsitem.title: UK: Robert Fleming appoints new U.S. head.
newsitem.headline: Robert Fleming appoints new U.S. head.

text.p: British independent investment bank Robert Fleming said it has appointed Stewart Massey as head of its U.S. operation Robert Fleming Inc.
Massey joins Flemings from Morgan Stanley where he was global head of Japanese equity sales based in New York and Tokyo.
Robert Fleming has a growing business in the U.S. in mergers and aquisitions and is the biggest broker of Asian equities in the U.S. market.
New York is also the base for its global mining group and its Latin American operations.
Massey will concentrate particulalrly on the securities business and the launch by Flemings of a range of global energy markets research products.
